titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of newspaper printing presses and components thereof.
To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of newspaper printing presses and components thereof.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Directs the United States Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of large newspaper printing presses and components thereof.
